TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SiteMap extends System.Object
public ref class SiteMap abstract sealed

summary.span: 類別是存放於記憶體之網站巡覽結構的表現方式，由一或多個網站導覽提供者所提供。

span.span: The class is an in-memory representation of the navigation structure for a site, which is provided by one or more site map providers.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 站台對應可以用於搭配， ，和其他控制項來呈現有效的瀏覽介面，供使用者瀏覽的網站。Site maps are used in conjunction with the , , and other controls to render an effective navigation interface for users to navigate a Web site. A物件會提供唯讀網站地圖資訊適用於使用瀏覽的頁面和控制項開發人員存取 ASP.NET 網站瀏覽基礎結構的元件和控制項。A object is a component of the ASP.NET site navigation infrastructure that provides access to read-only site map information for page and control developers using navigation and controls. ASP.NET 網站巡覽基礎結構的其他元件包括並類別、 的 Web.sitemap 檔案和使用的各種控制項類別，例如控制項，來呈現內容和功能表。Other components of the ASP.NET site navigation infrastructure include the and classes, the Web.sitemap file, and the various controls that work with the class, such as the control, to render content and menus. 有數個函式：The has several functions: - 它提供網站巡覽階層架構 （可以有只有一個根節點） 的根節點。It provides the root node of the site navigation hierarchy (there can be only one root node). - 它會識別哪一個網站導覽提供者是主體或預設值，提供者。It identifies which site map provider is the principal, or default, provider. - 它會追蹤的所有提供者物件，用來建立。It keeps track of all the provider objects that are used to create the . 基本上，是階層式集合的容器物件。Fundamentally, the is a container for a hierarchical collection of objects. 不過，不會維護節點; 之間的關聯性相反地，它會委派這至網站導覽提供者。However, the does not maintain the relationships between the nodes; rather, it delegates this to the site map providers. 做為站台瀏覽資訊的介面 (的形式物件)，由這些網站導覽提供者。The acts as an interface to the site navigation information (in the form of objects) that is held by these site map providers. 它會追蹤的提供者，它可以從中存取網站瀏覽資料並公開其集合。It keeps track of the providers from which it can access site navigation data and exposes its collection. 提供者可以任何方式儲存網站地圖資訊 — 只要它會擴充抽象類別，可以成功地初始化類別，從它。A provider can store its site map information in any way—as long as it extends the abstract class, the class can be initialized successfully from it. 預設提供者類別是類別，可使用 XML 組態檔，Web.sitemap。The default provider for the class is the class, which works with an XML configuration file, Web.sitemap. 不過，您可以撰寫您自己物件，並使用它來初始化您的站台的站台對應。However, you can write your own object, and use it to initialize the site map for your site. 如需自訂網站地圖提供者的範例，請參閱。For an example of a custom site map provider, see . 預設站台對應設定會指定可管理站台瀏覽設定。A default site map configuration is specified that manages the site navigation configuration. 您可以覆寫此設定，在 Web.config 檔案中，您應該選擇撰寫您自己的網站導覽提供者。You can override this configuration in the Web.config file, should you choose to write your own site map provider. 類別提供了效能只有靜態成員，而且可以隨時中存取指定的站台，從 Web Form 或 Web 伺服器控制項。The class offers only static members for performance and it can be accessed at any time in a given site from a Web Form or Web server control. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何宣告網站導覽提供者在 Web.config 檔案中。The first code example demonstrates how to declare a site map provider in a Web.config file. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何使用物件。The second code example demonstrates how to use a object. 下列程式碼範例是 Web.config 組態區段，將示範如何物件宣告為預設值物件。The following code example is a Web.config configuration section that demonstrates how an object is declared as the default object. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用藉由存取其靜態成員，以顯示相關資訊的物件和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object by accessing its static members to display information about the and properties. 比較所呈現的輸出控制項。Compare it to the output that is rendered by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_3/CS/sitemapcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_3/VB/sitemapvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Site Navigation Overview
ASP.NET Site Maps
ASP.NET Site Navigation Providers

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property CurrentNode As SiteMapNode
public: static property System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ CurrentNode { System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 控制項，表示目前要求的網頁。

span.span: Gets a control that represents the currently requested page.

value.span: 表示目前要求網頁的 執行個體，如果網站導覽資訊中沒有代表性節點，則為 。

span.span: A instance that represents the currently requested page; otherwise, , if no representative node exists in the site map information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別擷取所要求的方式從提供者的屬性。The class retrieves the property by requesting it from the provider. 如果沒有代表性節點存在網站導覽資訊，在該頁面，或如果安全性調整已啟用且節點無法傳回目前的使用者，`null`會傳回。If no representative node exists for the page in the site map information, or if security trimming is enabled and the node cannot be returned for the current user, `null` is returned. 的預設網站導覽提供者會引發事件，如果有一個或多個訂用帳戶存在。The event is raised by the default site map provider if one or more subscriptions exist. 如果您實作您自己物件，您可以建立自己的機制，以尋找並擷取。If you implement your own object, you might create your own mechanism to find and retrieve the . 不過，如果您擴充類別和使用以 URL 為基礎的配置，以識別頁面中，您可以覆寫方法。However, if you extend the class and use a URL-based scheme to identify pages, you can override the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以擷取物件，表示目前的頁面。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the object that represents the current page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_1/CS/catalogcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_1/VB/catalogvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The site map feature is not enabled.

exception.span: 組態中指定的預設提供者不存在。

span.span: The default provider specified in the configuration does not exist.

exception.span: 只有低度信任 (含) 以上的模式才有支援這個功能。

span.span: The feature is supported only when running in Low trust or higher.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Enabled As Boolean
public: static property bool Enabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得布林值，指出 Web.config 檔案中是否已指定網站導覽提供者，以及網站導覽提供者是否已啟用。

span.span: Gets a Boolean value indicating if a site map provider is specified in the Web.config file and if the site map provider is enabled.

value.span: 如果網站導覽提供者已設定和啟用，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a site map provider is configured and enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設站台對應設定會指定可管理站台瀏覽設定。A default site map configuration is specified that manages the site navigation configuration. 您可以覆寫此設定，在 Web.config 檔案中，您應該選擇撰寫您自己的網站導覽提供者。You can override this configuration in the Web.config file, should you choose to write your own site map provider. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是 Web.config 組態區段，將示範如何物件宣告為預設值物件。The following code example is a Web.config configuration section that demonstrates how an object is declared to be the default object. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Provider As SiteMapProvider
public: static property System::Web::SiteMapProvider ^ Provider { System::Web::SiteMapProvider ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前網站導覽的預設 物件。

span.span: Gets the default object for the current site map.

value.span: 的預設網站導覽提供者。

span.span: The default site map provider for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，物件可用，且網站巡覽資料會載入從位於站台的根目錄中的 Web.sitemap 檔案。By default, the object is used and site navigation data is loaded from the Web.sitemap file that is located in the root directory of the site. 這被識別管理網站巡覽組態和 Web.config 檔案的站台對應組態區段，管理類別中。This is identified in the management classes that manage the site navigation configuration and the site map configuration section of the Web.config files. 根據預設，它是的執行個體Web.sitemap 檔案做為其持續性存放區的類別。By default, it is an instance of the class, which uses the Web.sitemap file as its persistent store. 不過，您可以實作您自己的網站對應儲存體與組態配置撰寫的類別，會實作抽象類別。However, you can implement your own site map storage and configuration scheme by writing a class that implements the abstract class. 如需有關撰寫您自己的提供者的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on writing your own provider, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取預設物件使用靜態網站屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the default object for the site by using the static property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_2/CS/catalog2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_2/VB/catalog2vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Providers As SiteMapProviderCollection
public: static property System::Web::SiteMapProviderCollection ^ Providers { System::Web::SiteMapProviderCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得名稱為 物件的唯讀集合，這些物件可用於 類別。

span.span: Gets a read-only collection of named objects that are available to the class.
A of named objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網站導覽提供者所述集合會指定在組態階層架構，來初始化類別。The site map providers that are listed in the collection are those that are specified in the configuration hierarchy to initialize the class. 預設提供者 (由屬性) 保證可供期間初始化; 中的提供者的存在集合表示它已在組態中指定，而且已在初始化期間使用。Only the default provider (identified by the property) is guaranteed to be used by the during initialization; the presence of a provider in the collection means that it was specified in the configuration and was available during initialization. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取收集類別，然後逐一它。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve the collection from the class, and then iterate through it. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_2/CS/catalog2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_2/VB/catalog2vb.aspx#1)] 如果您有不只是預設設定的提供者為您的網站，您會看到顯示每個提供者。If you have more than just the default provider configured for your site, you will see each provider displayed. 例如，如果您使用的範例 Microsoft Access 提供者 (請參閱)，您會看到下列輸出：For example, if you are using the sample Microsoft Access provider (see ), you see the following output: ``` XmlSiteMapProvider System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider AccessSiteMapProvider Samples.AspNet.AccessSiteMapProvider ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property RootNode As SiteMapNode
public: static property System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ RootNode { System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 物件，表示網站巡覽結構最上層網頁。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the top-level page of the navigation structure for the site.

value.span: ，表示網站巡覽結構最上層網頁，如果安全性調整已啟用且節點無法回復目前使用者身分，則為 。

span.span: A that represents the top-level page of the site's navigation structure; otherwise, , if security trimming is enabled and the node cannot be returned to the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別擷取所要求的方式從提供者的屬性。The class retrieves the property by requesting it from the provider. 如果沒有提供者階層架構類別擷取根提供者階層架構中的根節點。If there is a provider hierarchy, the class retrieves the root node of the root provider in the hierarchy. 若要存取預設提供者的根節點，請呼叫屬性，它會擷取這兩個預設提供者並將其屬性。To access the root node of the default provider, call the property, which retrieves both the default provider and its property. 物件，這是預設提供者針對類別，支援只有一個。The object, which is the default provider for the class, supports only one . 如果您實作您自己類別並覆寫抽象屬性，您必須提供您自己的實作，來追蹤屬性執行個體。If you implement your own class and override the abstract property, you must provide your own implementation to track the property of the instance. 根節點必須是所設計的所有使用者看見。The root node must be visible to all users, by design. 如果安全性調整已啟用時，為不可見的所有使用者的根節點，存取屬性可能會導致例外狀況。If the root node is not visible to all users when security trimming is enabled, accessing the property might result in an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以擷取物件，表示站台，不論頁面階層架構中的目前位置的根節點。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the object that represents the root node of the site, regardless of the current location in the page hierarchy. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_1/CS/catalogcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap_1/VB/catalogvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The site map feature is not enabled.
\- or -

span.span: The resolves to , which occurs if security trimming is enabled and the root node is not visible to the current user.

exception.span: 組態中指定的預設提供者不存在。

span.span: The default provider specified in the configuration does not exist.

exception.span: 只有低度信任 (含) 以上的模式才有支援這個功能。

span.span: The feature is supported only when running in Low trust or higher.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event SiteMapResolve As SiteMapResolveEventHandler

summary.span: 當存取 屬性時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the property is accessed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訂閱者附加靜態物件事件，以接收通知時存取屬性。Subscribers attach a object to the static event to receive notification when the property is accessed. 這可讓使用者建立時，實作自訂邏輯表示目前正在執行的頁面上，而不需要自訂提供者實作。This enables the user to implement custom logic when creating a representation of the currently executing page without requiring a custom provider implementation. 如果您有訂閱事件，您也訂閱預設網站導覽提供者上的事件。If you subscribe to the event, you also subscribe to the event on the default site map provider. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理若要修改的目標 Url，會顯示由站台導覽控制項，例如 ASP.NET Web 網頁上的事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event on an ASP.NET Web page to modify the target URLs that are displayed by a site navigation control, such as the control. 在此範例中，目前的頁面會是線上電子佈告欄或論壇中張貼頁面。In this example, the current page is a post page in an online bulletin board or forum. 若要呈現更有意義網站導覽節點的導覽控制項所顯示的 Url 會附加內容相關的查詢字串。In order to render more meaningful site navigation, the URLs of the nodes that are displayed by the navigation control are appended with context relevant query strings. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 網站巡覽基礎結構可防止無限遞迴時，它可提供一種防護措施，並存取相關聯的安全性風險降至最低屬性從類別。The ASP.NET site navigation infrastructure guards against infinite recursion, which provides a safeguard and minimizes the security risk that is associated with accessing the property from within the class. 下列程式碼所屬的 Global.asax 檔案中。The following code belongs in the Global.asax file. 將應用程式一次附加事件處理常式。The event handler will be attached only once for the application. 程式碼可辨識的頁面是否實作`ISiteMapResolver`介面。The code recognizes whether the page implements the `ISiteMapResolver` interface. 實作介面時，如果`ExpandForumPaths`呼叫函式。If the interface is implemented, the `ExpandForumPaths` function is called. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/CS/sitemapresolve1cs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/VB/sitemapresolve1vb.aspx.vb#1)] 下列程式碼會定義個別的介面。The following code defines a separate interface. （在網站專案中，您可以將此程式碼在 App_Code 資料夾中。）`ISiteMapResolver`介面會定義`ExpandForumPaths`方法。(In a Web site project, you can put this code in the App_Code folder.) The `ISiteMapResolver` interface defines the `ExpandForumPaths` method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/CS/sitemapresolve1cs.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/VB/sitemapresolve1vb.aspx.vb#2)] 下列程式碼所屬至少三個節點的頁面與網站導覽結構中的深度。The following code belongs with the page that is at least three nodes deep in the site-map structure. 頁面會實作`ISiteMapResolver`介面，可讓`ExpandForumPaths`来呼叫的方法。The page implements the `ISiteMapResolver` interface, which enables the `ExpandForumPaths` method to be called. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/CS/sitemapresolve1cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMap.SiteMapResolve/VB/sitemapresolve1vb.aspx#3)]
